An '''andesite slab''' is an [[andesite]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Andesite slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Andesite slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
